titleStmt.title: A letter from the King of Spain written to the Pope of Rome Licens'd, September 29. 1690.
titleStmt.author: Spain. Sovereign (1665-1700 : Charles II)
Catholic Church. Pope (1689-1691 : Alexander VIII)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Baldwin near the Oxford-Arms in Warwick-Lane,

notesStmt.note: The King of Spain = Charles II; the Pope of Rome = Alexander VIII.
At end: Printed after the copy of Jacob Scheltus. 1690.
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
